  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • setEnableProfilerForBatchProcessAndWorkQueue

      public static void setEnableProfilerForBatchProcessAndWorkQueue(boolean enable, BatchProcessType type, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for batch processes of the given type and their associated work queue
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      type - batch process type
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForBatchProcess

      public static void setEnableProfilerForBatchProcess(boolean enable, BatchProcessType type, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for batch processes of the given type
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      type - batch process type
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForWorkQueue

      public static void setEnableProfilerForWorkQueue(boolean enable, BatchProcessType type, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for work queues associated with the given batch process type
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      type - batch process type
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination

      public static void setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination(boolean enable, String destinationName, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for the given message destination
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      destinationName - name of destination
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination

      public static void setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination(boolean enable, int destinationID, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for the given message destination
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      destinationID - id of destination
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForWebService

      public static void setEnableProfilerForWebService(boolean enable, String serviceName, String operationName, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for the given web service (service name, operation name) pair
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      serviceName - service name (required)
      operationName - operation name (required )
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForStartablePlugin

      public static void setEnableProfilerForStartablePlugin(boolean enable, String pluginName, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for the given StartablePlugin
      Parameters:
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      pluginName - plugin name (required)
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

    • setEnableProfilerForSubsequentWebSessions

      public static void setEnableProfilerForSubsequentWebSessions(String name, boolean enable, boolean hiResTime, boolean enableStackTracing, boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing, boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing, int dbmsCounterThresholdMs, boolean diffDbmsCounters)
      Enable or disable the profiler for subsequent web sessions
      Parameters:
      name - name for the profiler session. optional; use null for the default name.
      enable - whether to enable or disable
      hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
      enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
      enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
      dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
      diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.
